EmailTemplate.subject: See Why NASCAR Champion Brad Keselowski Chose DU-875!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Still on the fence about whether to upgrade your aircraft with DU-875 displays? For NASCAR champion Brad Keselowski, upgrading to Honeywell's DU-875 Displays and Primus Elite was the most economical decision because it equipped his aircraft with the latest technology and increased his aircraft’s equity. But don’t take our word for it. Click below to hear him talk about his satisfaction with the brighter, clearer, high-resolution picture the DU-875 displays provide.
<[[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1V9ePUd_5Tk]]>
Ready for the clearest views? Take advantage of a $35,000 Honeywell trade-in credit per DU-870 display unit you replace, plus take advantage of additional savings on your Honeywell Maintenance Service Plan – Avionics contract. But hurry – these offers end December 31, 2019! Contact Pentastar Aviation today to learn more or request a quote.
CONTACT PENTASTAR AVIATION <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/DU-875_Upgrade_Pentastar.html?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_pentastar_du875&utm_content=engaged&utm_term=m:1]]>
